page.title: 02A CHILD'S DAY
page.content:
When I wake up in the morning, normally about 7.45 I get out of bed and go downstairs for breakfast. I have a bowl of cereal and a cup of tea. I then get dressed and ready for school. At 8.35 I come out and go to school and we play football until 9.00. Then we go into school and begin work.
At 12.00 we wash our hands and come in for lunch. I have a packed lunch of sandwiches. After lunch we have a playtime until 1.00. At 3.30 we finish school for the day. When I get home I go to the shop for some sweets and then I watch television.
We have tea at 5.30 and after tea I watch television until my bed time at 9.00.
